name: Colin Morgan
personality: Ambitious and detail-oriented, with a love for strategy games
story: Dwan grew up in a military family and always knew that he wanted to serve his country. He joined the army straight out of high school and has worked his way up to become an ammo bearer. He is determined to continue his ascent up the ranks and one day become an officer. In his free time, he enjoys playing strategy games and analyzing military tactics.
